item_category: Alcatel 1T10 SMART tablet supports the latest Android OS, with 2GB & 32GB ROM storage. 2 Powerful speakers give you a theatre-like experience. Google Assistant to manage tasks and Google Photos to enjoy family memories. A large, all day battery and Quad Core CPU provide stronger performance and lower power consumption. Keep in touch with family & friends with hands-free calling supported by 2 microphones, each with far-field voice recognition. Kids mode provides a friendly user interface and parental controls over application and internet use.

review_text: I bought this for my partially sighted mother to play games on. It is perfect for her as she isn't very tech savvy
bought for myself it has a good clear picture good sound nice and compact
Fast and reliable good camera and can't fault it I give it a 5 star
I bought this product for my mum she finds it easy to use And it’s just the right size would recommend to anybody
It's a good tablet easy to setup
The product really serves it's purpose. Every customer would appreciate the features it had got.

I purchased this When. My iPad Decided That It Didn’t Want To Work AnyMoreI purchased This As a. Stop. Gap.If is not a Fussy Person And Doesn’t Try To Compare It’ With Something
MoreExpensive With All The Bells And Whistles You Won’t Be Disappointed.OneHundred% Recommended
I bought this for a friends as birthday presant hes very happy with it. Its faster than other tablets hes had so happy wth purchasing would recommend it
As Expected for the price
Great for YouTube and simple internet use, battery life is good,  comparable with most games, good size screen and light weight. Over all good value for money.
Would definitely recommend this tab for any child or adult
Good price for a good gadget.
Its very good for a little Child to Watch song for baby or peppa pig
Very good. Made a daughter happy. Good quality
My Grandson was over the moon with his phone.
Perfectly acceptable tablet. Case feels a little weak so use a tablet case to protect it.
good price value tablet

I have an ipad, and I can't see that its display is any better than the Alcatel. We haven't found a way of installing our Talktalk email account yet but for everything else that we have tried it works well. Some people think that it takes a long time to charge -- well so does my ipad!
The tablet is a good size I can see it
Wouldn't recommend had it less than a week it would not charge and could not get it to work had to get a refund
Wouldn’t connect to the internet gave up in the end
not a very good product, i would not recommend this product to anyone.
Staff were very helpful and polite
An easy to use and compatible tablet. Good sized screen and sensible price.

The tablet does not function properly. I got it for my kids to use for their home school but we were not able to open the app for the learning for about three days. Most of the app will not play or open. I spent money and I can't use it for the purpose it was bought.
Does what I need it to worth the money would purchase again
Looks good easy to use does what it says on the tin
Great tablet for home schooling! Holds all the school apps and spare memory for games and photos.
Easy to set up and transfer data using easy to follow steps and options.
Apps close, runs slow total waste of money
Nice big screen and plenty of storage on it.
I m glad I purchased the iPad works well and I purchased it so local to me
Good value product, wouldn't win any awards for looks or speed but for the price you couldn't expect anything more!
Bought the tablet and returned it the next week. Not functioning properly at all.
Very good value tablet. Easy to use and it was ready to go straight out of the box!!!
Easy to set up and transfer over from my old tablet.
Slower than my 5 year old tablet.took it back next day
For the price I paid its value for money. Great picture  Great speed. Does the job of my old Samsung tablet.  Really good buy.  I would recommend this

Purchased this as a replacement for a tablet purchased from a different online retailer that developed a 'dead strip' on the touchscreen after only 2 weeks.
So far, this has been far better and faster.
Very pleased with this purchase, and almost glad I had to return the other one!
Has big screen and has good apps
Does what I need - it’s a bit slow to react but at the price it is I’m not complaining!

Needed a new tablet.for littles ones schoolwork
 My old galaxy 7 was passed it this was half it's original price. Worked straight from the box in every way
Pops 70
excellent value tablet with reasonable battery life

Although happy with the quality of the performance of the tablet it didn't match the specification as shown on the Argos website. It stated that the tablet came with 1 x 2.0 USB. The tablet I received does not have any USB ports. I did raise a question on the website regarding to this but still haven't had a reply. I have checked the website again today and it now states in the spec. that the tablet comes with 2 x 2.0 USB. Either I have the wrong tablet or the spec is wrong.

Great little (well actually a good size!) tablet for general use & home schooling. Google compatible unlike the Amazon tablets.
It’s no IPad, so don’t expect it to be super quick, but it does a good job.
It is a little slow on charging, but put on over night it’s ready to start the next 8:50 live school lesson. Thumbs up!
I'm  not very technical minded but found it very easy to set up.  Very pleased with its performance so far.  Quality of TV catch ups  very good.
Handles Google classroom/meet and seesaw perfectly . Perfect for what I bought them for. Would recommend and buy again
Works amazing, absolutely no issues

Really good value for money, does everything you need from an economy tablet.

Bought this as a present for the Mrs and I can't get her off the blinking thing. 

Recommended.
A great product does as intended.
Bought as a present for my grandson. He seems pleased with it so far. Good price too!
Amazing tablet great value for money too
Great tablet worth the money works well
slow, and un reliable tablet but the service was good.
Great little table, does everything you need from it, screen easily gets finger marks on it but easy to clean  so all round great tablet for a great price.
Really good one, I’ve purchased it for my daughter online class. Good one for good price.
Amazing price and would definitely recommend it :)
Excellent tablet for the money would recommend to anyone
not worth the money. Freezes every 30 minutes

For what we wanted, a cheap tablet to replace an existing one, it does everything that we ask it to, although I would think that some people would like better resolution and performance but then you will be paying a lot more.
The only issue I have, so far, is that the charging socket is not micro USB, where my other devices are. It is very similar, but my chargers don't seem to fit. Otherwise, it seems OK.
My tablet was perfect
Good price for a 32gb
Takes ages to load and video camera freezes
Very good and chaged my life
Doesnt sta connected to the internet

Brought to help with home learning, able to access all required sites and easy for the kids to navigate around. Good size, only con is they can occasionally be sluggish to respond but for the price an overall great buy.

A splendid machine. It does what I want which is searching the net etc.
No issues with speed etc.
Great tablet easy to set up bought it as a gift for my wife she was impressed with it I would recommend as a start up tablet or replacement

This tablet is not going to be for working on projects or serious gaming. 
It will be perfect for online browsing, lite tasks and some simple games. 
Screen is acceptable for the price, not top quality but more than usable. For under £100 you probably will not find better spec wise.
If you want a simple usable tablet to save your phone battery this is perfect. 
If you want an all singing and dancing tablet you need to be looking at the £200 and above price range.
The Alcatel smart is very good so far, takes a while to charge up though.
Bought for my husband it was very simple to set and start using. Battery lasts a long time.Excellent product and great value for money.
It is really good for online school work during this lockdown.
Very nice product and the staff who served me was very fine excellent
After looking for one this is far the best for what I wanted it for and the cost was excellent
Just what my grandson need to do his home schooling on
It is a great tablet so easy to use I would recommend it for everyone
There is a reason this tablet is cheap!
I bought this tablet for my husband for Christmas he loves it he said it was the best one he's had good buy x
Good easy too use good sound lots of good features and my mum can use it aswell simple layout

Would not work, waste of money.
Unable to download any apps from app store.
Staff said it was due to low RAM but our replacement tablet from another shop has same RAM and works fine.
Rang the UK customer service number and got a recorded message telling us that the number had changed... rang the changed number and got a lock smiths??

Dont bother buying!!
It was reasonably priced compared to others. I did look about first before buying
The way I got service from Argos it’s simply the best and so professional. I Loved it & I will recommend my family and friend.
I actually don't like it because its working very slow and the screen pictures are really dull .. sorry but I will not recommend this
Tabket is excellent the size of screen is perfect
The tablet is well worth the price does everything well,excellent purchase
Nice reliable bargain priced tablet. My son uses it for home schooling during lockdown and I use it during the evening. No issues with it so far. All good.

Easy to use, easy to set-up, all my kids including a 4 year old know how to use this tablet, so far it works great, and I'd recommend this to a friend.
It's a android tablet with Google play store , good for streaming and gaming, Facebook etc
Well impressed with the Alcatel tablet. Would definitely recommend. Easy to use even for the over sixties.
Nice design and lasts for a few days on the one charge
Till now i couldn't find any problems.
Would highly recommend this product it's fab
Purchased this to use for home and home schooling as our other tablets wouldn’t run google classroom. Nice size and works well. Easy to use and good price. Would recommend.
It's a great asset just what I needed at the right price
I brought  for my friend and she like it alots

Cannot fault the device does everything my previous more expensive tablet did, does fell a little plastic, and the camera is not so good, but I only purchased it for using it on the internet and watching TV .

Brilliant tablet,so glad we got this one now. My son loves it and can do everything he needs to,great sound,picture,battery life is excellent. had no problems what so ever and have one very happy boy! Definitely recommend and was a great price too. Plenty of storage with out an SD card so far. Would buy again.

Bought for my mum. She finds screen size is about right for her without device being too heavy. So far so good but unfortunately have had problems with other tablets becoming faulty after a few months of constant use.

For the money I was expecting cheap and cheerful. Wow was I wrong, this is a brilliant tablet. It is fast, very fast, easy to set up and use, with a generous size memory and a good size ram. Great for most basic surfing and online games. I am no good with specification and figures but I have now bought 3 of these so our family can keep in touch online. Vital in the current time.
It's a nice tablet and it's easy to use. It has a very clear sound. I am happy with it.
Only had it 14 days and had to reboot almost immediately then glitchy. Has died but the battery is charged. In lockdown so can't take it back yet!
This is a good little basic tablet for the price. Only 2gb of RAM so it's not the fastest but it's functional and the display is great.
Cracking little tablet, perfect for streaming which is its prime purpose for me. Battery is decent and it runs pretty smooth.
The display, speed at which the tablet processes and its charge are all proving to be highly efficient and the tablet is very light, even compared to other tablets that are the same size

This tablet is okay for simple tasks but does not cope well with large amounts of data (e.g. video call) and can generally be a bit slow. My mobile phone is better in that regard. However, it was purchased for homeschooling purposes and it is sufficient for that.

It really easy to use I am vary happy with it
It does what I want it to do great
Great Tablet works well for what I needed it for.
Good tablet for the money. Plenty of apps and child locks included to keep children safe online.
Just what I wanted very happy

Not a high performance tablet by any means, but more than adequate for most daily tasks, and ideal for streaming movies etc. At least it comes with the latest Android version (10) and all the usual apps pre-loaded
great tablet for the price just make sure you download the Android 10 update
Good purchase and good value for money. I found it very easy to use and set up.
This tablet is brill, its easy to set up and you will be up and using it in 10mins. Its lots of space, good size to hold and see the screen. Well worth the money.
It great for the price paid

This tablet is very lightweight and easy to use The battery life is very good my only disappointment is that the photo quality is not good very grainy.
Would I buy it again.. Probably not based on the photo quality as I use photos for work.
Be patient! Takes a while to update things and may seem slow at first. However, once everything is updated, it works a treat.

Great price for what it is needed for. Bought fir my elderly mother for facebook and playing games. A much cheaper option than paying over £200 for a Samsung 10inch. This 10 inch is perfect for my Mum.

Brilliant large tablet, it was a Christmas gift for my mother who isn’t very tech savvy but she’s got along great with this tablet, it was an upgrade from a 7 inch and she prefers the much larger screen, runs very well, great purchase.

Does exactly what you would expect first social media games.

not the first but it's a nice chunky design so you get a firm hold simple I use it for my child so it's quite durable without any cases .
Quality of the screen is very good I personally was expecting a rubbish screen for something for this price but it's just add responsive as big-name brands .

Doesn't slow down providing you clear your apps and don't leave them all open.

I'm comparing this to a Samsung S7
Fantastic tablets great price and very easy to use my hubby was chuffed with it

I bought this tablet to ease up on the amount of apps on my phone. I have been pleasantly surprised to be fair. It was good for team and zoom app meetings. It is good for video and film watching. It is a little heavy so not great for arthritis users or people with muscle weakness. It takes good pictures. But it takes an age to charge and the battery does not last long before needing recharging. Great for a childs first interaction with technology as it is intuitive. Battery use lost it a star.
This is a great product its easy to set up and navigate the apps screen size is great and good quality sound would recommend it
Excellent piece of kit very good for videos and music

A good tablet really easy to use.. Battery is good.. Design is excellent..

Would recommend this tablet..
I bought this tablet for kids online study and so far it is working well.

Bought 2 for my boys (both under 10) as they had outgrown their 7 inch tablets. These were perfect, priced so that if they get broken i wont be too heartbroken at an eye-watering replacement price. You get what you pay for though, dont expect lightening speed processing or huge memory. Its entry level, cheap and cheerful and perfect for two young and clumsy children.

Good product does what it says on the package
Didn’t receive my nectar points though
Brilliant budget tablet, does nearly everything my computer does. However do not expect miracles from this unit.
Looks good but performance is bad very slow between Windows

Bought this for my son but he wasn't happy with it at all. It keeps disconnecting from the WiFi & was getting stuck on YouTube. Ended up buying him another brand and am now using this one myself. It's ok for looking at FB & emails but still keeps disconnecting from WiFi.  Battery life is poor and takes a very long time to charge. Left it on a charger overnight, it still wasn't fully charged! Don't recommend.
Simple,easy to use,great basics for my son's education
Great device, easy to set up and image great quality.

I usually have Samsung Tablets but thought I'd have a change and this was alot cheaper and with more memory. The tablet looks nice and sleek slim in design picture/video/screen quality is very good. Down load speed is very good and flipping from screen to screen is good. It is on par with a Samsung tablet. My only niggle is the tablet does take a while to charge up but once charged it holds its charge for quite a long time depending on your use.
+ light. good battery life. good sound.

Bought as Xmas present for my husband who is not very IT literate. Set it up for him, he is over the moon with it so easy to read, very clear screen and soon got use to using it. He is in his 70s !! Goes on it every day.

This is like an extension to my android phone it's not the most expensive and the battery isn't the longest lasting but I love it screen is great for hd viewing  this is a million times better than I pads I have to use at work I also booted up the storage to 128g for less than £20
I love the size of my tablet

It boots up really quickly and does a system update, so far so good. Downhill from this point. Battery life is not good, the main culprits being the bluetooth and location on all the time, they eat battery time. Real shame because it looks good and is responsive for a two year old design. Buy one as a first or standby tablet, just be aware of its limitations, it's not an iPad substitute ☹
Got this for granddaughter,  she loves going on you tube and getting educational videos

Excellent quality tablet, it's works great, strong and has a great screen. It is very quick and very simple to use and has USB-C so it fast charges. The memory is small but I fitted a 64gb card without any issues.

The battery lasts approximately 5hrs of constant streaming Netflix at half the brightness level so is pretty good, it wasn't flat at the time either!
Great value at a very reasonable price. Does everything that I want.

We bought 2 as Christmas present for our children. Delivery was quick, item was as described, set up was easy, good quality screen and picture works perfectly, can not say anything negative would recommend.
Bought for my mother a decent basic tablet at a good price
Amazing, enough space for all my apps.
It's good for the kids my daughter loves it
Does everything I need a tablet for picture quality really good

Does everything I needs tablet for. Kindle books, internet, emails and face book.
Compared to all others before buying this seemed the better one based on other reviews for those of similar spec and price.
Found tablet to be easy and as plenty of battery life and storage superb
Great value for money
This is great for my needs which is browsing the Internet and also watched films with no issues.
Android 10. Great tablet great price
Bought for my grandsons birthday he was over the moon
New tablet for children to use. Seems to work well so far. Easy to set up.
Price good power battery life every thing you want at half the price of leading brands and at a high standard product
Tablet is lovely. Functionality is good. My little one liked

Bought this tablet for an online course. Does exactly what you'd expect. Easy connectivity, battery held out well while I was working. Easy to move between pages, lightweight and slim design great tablet for the money.
It's a great light weight tablet which sees to all my needs and more and Great for all the family
